headline: BMI Capital Maintains Positive Outlook on S&P Global (SPGI)
summary: S&P Global Inc. (NYSE:SPGI) is one of the best dividend stocks in the financial sector. On November 14, Jeffrey Silber from BMI Capital reiterated a Buy call on SPGI, and moved up the price target from $538 to $546. In a separate business update dated November 13, S&P Global Inc. (NYSE:SPGI) reported that its board […]
